thread.section_title: Flatmates.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flatmates.com.au | flatmates.com.au
thread.title: Taranga

author: Taranga
title: Taranga
text: I have found both of my flatmates from Flatmates.com.au and they have both been wonderful. So if you are wondering about Flatmates don't, just place up your profile and get started. As a platform they are very helpful in sending you potential flatmates and if you do not find your flatmate in time, they give you an extension which I have used so thanks for that. It certainly helps if you need more time. I will certainly be using this platform again.
